title: Wiring systems installed vertically
fullText:
Where wiring systems are installed vertically, they shall be installed in accordance with the requirements of Clauses 3.9.2 and 3.9.3 and in such a manner as to avoid damage to any part of the wiring system that may be caused by its own weight or method of support or fixing.
Adequate provision shall be made for the support of cables enclosed in a wiring enclosure installed vertically. Cable supports shall be provided at intervals not exceeding 8 m or as recommended by the cable manufacturer.
